description:
For trail runs with creek crossings, or just days where you want ultimate breathability, these shoes have you covered. By wrapping a breathable sock liner in the EVA shell from their Hydro Mocs, Merrell has created a runner with out of this world styling and airflow.

  • EVA uppers are light, flexible, easy to clean, and ported for breathability
  • Recycled mesh liner wicks away moisture and breathes well
  • 50% recycled EVA foam insole
  • EVA midsole has high rebound and offers a comfortable all day stability
  • Cleansport NXT™ natural odour control keeps your feet smelling fresh
  • Grippy outsole is heavily lugged for traction on loose terrain
name: Merrell Hydro Runner Shoes - Men's
